item.description:
APRIL 9 2009. THURSDAY

Mill On the River.

One Low Price. See below.

$15.00


HAPPY HOUR TIME!
Happy Hour Prices from 5-7PM. Our area open till 9:00P

With THE IRA!!!


EXCITING NEWS BELOW

With a New Twist. It just got Better!!!! Because of the number of Single People there last week, we overwhelmed the Bar, and Wait Staff. Close to 40 Hot Singles who mingled so well……

AND THE NEWS IS:

A. We will now have a Exclusive Area downstairs, which will include a Private Patio with dramatic Water view.

B. Our own knowledgeable Bar Staff, and Attentive Wait Staff.

One Low Price for All. $ 15.00. ( Same cost if you do not have a mixed drink)

C. The cold hors d’oeuvres, such as cheese and crackers and antipasto, will be set-up buffet style. Our chef will select some hot hors d’oeuvres that will be butler-passed from 5:00 – 7:00.
We will provide each guest with two drink tickets that will be available for complimentary Happy Hour Drinks from 5:00 – 7:00. After this time the bar will change to cash & carry.

Don’t miss out on the fun, entertainment of Ira, and the Big 4- Get to Know Each Other Question Fun Period with Prizes for the Best Last Question Story. A big success for sure, and a tradition to be continued……

Filled with fun, stimulating conversation, meeting new folks, and enjoying the Happy Hour Food and Drink Specials. Celebrate Every Thursday of week and maybe meet your “Special Person”.

Where: The Mill on the River, 989 Ellington Road, South Windsor, CT.

Downstairs, Our own Exclusive Area

Please- RSVP No Later than April 9, Thursday, no later than 9:00AM, so the restaurant can determine how much delicious food to prepare.

Ira Wettenstein- 860-604-5792- mistrchrming@aol.com

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: A MOST TERRIFIC HAPPY HOUR WITH A NEW TWIST
